name: Brain War
description:
Brain War

Core GamePlay:

 Your Character Change at any time！！！

As normal platformer game, there are demon and angel in this game. 

Demon need to Climb the tower and Angel need to control gravity to stop demon.

Your character will change as Demon or Angel during the game at any time.

You need to make sure your character can win when time runs out!

Control:

When you are Demon:

A: Go left

D:Go right

Space:Jump

Victory Conditions:At top platform when time runs out

When you are angel:

A: Turn down Gravity

B:Turn Up Gravity

Space: Make gravity Change

Victory Conditions: Make demon at  the bottom of tower when time runs out 

When you're trying to lose weight at the gym, you always want to eat Fried chicken.

The Demon and Angel fight in your body and try to control your mind.

However, even you can not control your mind.

Brain war is a platformer game.

In this Game you have two roles:Angel and Demon

They have different aimbitions and different Victory conditions.

Your roles will switch anytime during the game.

You can be as demon to eat FRIED CHICKEN on top of the tower or be as angel to make devil working hard at GYM.

As a demon, you can jump and go for your chicken and calories.

As a angel, you can control the gravity, stop the demon from Eating Chicken and ask her go to GYM.

At the end of the time, victory conditions depend on your roles.

If you are Demon, you need to be at the top of the tower.

If you are Angel,  you need to make demon stay at the bottom of the tower.

Except against AI，We also have a two Player Mode in which you can play with your friend.

It can play with the same logic and use one keyborad to control.

However, Cause the time limit, we could not finished the UI of two-play mode.

There are strategy to win but success or failure depend more on fortune.

Play!

and ,

Try to control your mind.
